SELECT M.MENU_CD, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_UP, M.MENU_SP, DATE_FORMAT(M.MN_REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MN_REG_DT, DATE_FORMAT(M.MN_MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MN_MOD_DT FROM MENU M
AND M.MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND M.MENU_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY M.MN_REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{startCount} , 10
